books.author: edited by Nikole Hannah-Jones, Caitlin Roper, Ilena Silverman and Jake Silverstein
books.description: Viewing America’s entanglement with slavery and its legacy, in essays adapted and expanded from The New York Times Magazine.
books.name: THE 1619 PROJECT

books.author: by Dave Grohl
books.description: A memoir by the musician known for his work with Foo Fighters and Nirvana.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Will Smith with Mark Manson
books.description: The actor, producer and musician tells his life story and lessons he learned along the way.
books.name: WILL

books.author: by Paul McCartney
books.description: A two-volume celebration of 154 songs, with handwritten texts, paintings and photographs from the songwriter’s archives.
books.name: THE LYRICS: 1956 TO THE PRESENT

books.author: by Stanley Tucci
books.description: The award-winning actor reflects on his career, Italian-American heritage, meals and mishaps.
books.name: TASTE

books.author: by Rachel Campos-Duffy and Sean Duffy
books.description: A collection of holiday memories from members of the staff of Fox News.
books.name: ALL AMERICAN CHRISTMAS

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade
books.description: The Fox News host gives an account of the relationship between Abraham Lincoln and Frederick Douglass.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT AND THE FREEDOM FIGHTER

books.author: by bell hooks
books.description: The late feminist icon explores the causes of a polarized society and the meaning of love.
books.name: ALL ABOUT LOVE

books.author: by the Beatles
books.description: The story of the making of the band’s final album, gathered from transcripts of their conversations.
books.name: THE BEATLES: GET BACK

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Barack Obama and Bruce Springsteen
books.description: Conversations between the 44th president and the multiple award-winning musician on a range of topics.
books.name: RENEGADES

books.author: by Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
books.description: The anti-vaccine advocate gives his take on the chief medical advisor to the president.
books.name: THE REAL ANTHONY FAUCI

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Essays on friendships, influences and the connection between life and art.
books.name: THESE PRECIOUS DAYS

books.author: by Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
books.name: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: by David Graeber and David Wengrow
books.description: A reinvestigation of social evolution and suggestions for new ways of organizing society.
books.name: THE DAWN OF EVERYTHING
